text: The Basseri are a Persian nomadic and pastoral tribe of the Fars Province in Iran.Their migratory area is around Shiraz.The Basseri are a tribe of Khamseh confederation. Basseries are Persian.They are the survivors of Pasargadean tribe, the biggest tribe of Persia in Achaemenid Empire period.They speak Persian with a different accent.They are Shia Muslims. ==Sources== * *Ehsan Yousefi,nomads of Persia:The Basseri tribe;2014;Shiraz Category:Ethnic groups in Iran
